sentences.chinese: 莊襄王元年，以呂不韋為丞相，封為文信侯，食河南雒陽十萬戶。
sentences.literal: Zhuangxiang Wang first year, appointed Lü Buwei as chancellor, enfeoffed as Wenxin Marquis, ate Luoyang ten thousand households.
sentences.idiomatic: In the first year of King Zhuangxiang, Lü Buwei was appointed chancellor and enfeoffed as Marquis Wenxin, with revenue from ten thousand households in Luoyang.

sentences.chinese: 莊襄王即位三年，薨，太子政立為王，尊呂不韋為相國，號稱「仲父」。
sentences.literal: Zhuangxiang Wang ascended third year, died, crown prince Zheng established as king, honored Lü Buwei as prime minister, titled 'Zhong Fu'.
sentences.idiomatic: In the third year of King Zhuangxiang's reign, he died, and Crown Prince Zheng was established as king. Lü Buwei was honored as prime minister of the state and given the title 'Zhong Fu' (Second Father).

sentences.chinese: 秦王年少，太后時時竊私通呂不韋。
sentences.literal: Qin king young, Empress Dowager often secretly communicated Lü Buwei.
sentences.idiomatic: Qin king young, Empress Dowager often secretly communicated Lü Buwei.

sentences.chinese: 不韋家僮萬人。
sentences.literal: Buwei household retainers ten thousand persons.
sentences.idiomatic: Buwei household retainers ten thousand persons.

sentences.chinese: 當是時，魏有信陵君，楚有春申君，趙有平原君，齊有孟嘗君，皆下士喜賓客以相傾。
sentences.literal: At this time, Wei had Xinyang Jun, Chu had Chunshen Jun, Zhao had Pingyuan Jun, Qi had Mengchang Jun, all recruited scholars delighted guests to mutually contend.
sentences.idiomatic: At this time, Wei had Xinyang Jun, Chu had Chunshen Jun, Zhao had Pingyuan Jun, Qi had Mengchang Jun, all recruited scholars delighted guests to mutually contend.

sentences.chinese: 呂不韋以秦之彊，羞不如，亦招致士，厚遇之，至食客三千人。
sentences.literal: Lü Buwei with Qin's strength, ashamed not equal, also recruited scholars, thick treated them, to guests three thousand persons.
sentences.idiomatic: Lü Buwei with Qin's strength, ashamed not equal, also recruited scholars, thick treated them, to guests three thousand persons.

sentences.chinese: 是時諸侯多辯士，如荀卿之徒，著書布天下。
sentences.literal: At this time feudal lords many debaters, like Xun Qing and others, wrote books spread world.
sentences.idiomatic: At this time feudal lords many debaters, like Xun Qing and others, wrote books spread world.

sentences.chinese: 呂不韋乃使其客人人著所聞，集論以為八覽、六論、十二紀，二十餘萬言。
sentences.literal: Lü Buwei thus made his guests each write what heard, collected theories as eight views, six discussions, twelve records, twenty plus ten thousand words.
sentences.idiomatic: Lü Buwei thus made his guests each write what heard, collected theories as eight views, six discussions, twelve records, twenty plus ten thousand words.

sentences.chinese: 以為備天地萬物古今之事，號曰呂氏春秋。
sentences.literal: Considered complete heaven earth myriad things ancient modern affairs, titled 'Lü Shi Chun Qiu'.
sentences.idiomatic: Considered complete heaven earth myriad things ancient modern affairs, titled 'Lü Shi Chun Qiu'.

sentences.chinese: 布咸陽市門，懸千金其上，延諸侯游士賓客有能增損一字者予千金。
sentences.literal: Spread Xianyang market gate, hung thousand jin above, invited feudal lords wandering scholars guests able increase decrease one word give thousand jin.
sentences.idiomatic: Spread Xianyang market gate, hung thousand jin above, invited feudal lords wandering scholars guests able increase decrease one word give thousand jin.

sentences.chinese: 始皇帝益壯，太后淫不止。
sentences.literal: First Emperor increasingly mature, Empress Dowager licentious not stop.
sentences.idiomatic: First Emperor increasingly mature, Empress Dowager licentious not stop.

sentences.chinese: 呂不韋恐覺禍及己，乃私求大陰人嫪毐以為舍人，時縱倡樂，使毐以其陰關桐輪而行，令太后聞之，以啗太后。
sentences.literal: Lü Buwei feared calamity reach self, thus secretly sought great endowment man Lao Ai as retainer, timely released singers music, made Ai with his endowment pass paulownia wheel to travel, commanded Empress Dowager hear, to tempt Empress Dowager.
sentences.idiomatic: Lü Buwei feared calamity reach self, thus secretly sought great endowment man Lao Ai as retainer, timely released singers music, made Ai with his endowment pass paulownia wheel to travel, commanded Empress Dowager hear, to tempt Empress Dowager.

sentences.chinese: 太后聞，果欲私得之。
sentences.literal: Empress Dowager heard, truly wished privately obtain him.
sentences.idiomatic: Empress Dowager heard, truly wished privately obtain him.

sentences.chinese: 呂不韋乃進嫪毐，詐令人以腐罪告之。
sentences.literal: Lü Buwei thus advanced Lao Ai, falsely had person with rotten crime accuse him.
sentences.idiomatic: Lü Buwei thus advanced Lao Ai, falsely had person with rotten crime accuse him.

sentences.chinese: 不韋又陰謂太后曰：「可事詐腐，則得給事中。」
sentences.literal: Buwei again secretly told Empress Dowager: 'Can make falsely rotten crime, then obtain serve inner palace.'
sentences.idiomatic: Buwei again secretly told Empress Dowager: 'Can make falsely rotten crime, then obtain serve inner palace.'

sentences.chinese: 太后乃陰厚賜主腐者吏，詐論之，拔其須眉為宦者，遂得侍太后。
sentences.literal: Empress Dowager thus secretly thick rewarded main rotten officials, falsely judged him, pulled his beard eyebrows as eunuch, thus obtained serve Empress Dowager.
sentences.idiomatic: Empress Dowager thus secretly thick rewarded main rotten officials, falsely judged him, pulled his beard eyebrows as eunuch, thus obtained serve Empress Dowager.

sentences.chinese: 太后私與通，絕愛之。
sentences.literal: Empress Dowager privately communicated, extremely favored him.
sentences.idiomatic: Empress Dowager privately communicated, extremely favored him.

sentences.chinese: 有身，太后恐人知之，詐卜當避時，徙宮居雍。
sentences.literal: Had pregnancy, Empress Dowager feared people know, falsely divined should avoid time, moved palace dwell Yong.
sentences.idiomatic: Had pregnancy, Empress Dowager feared people know, falsely divined should avoid time, moved palace dwell Yong.

sentences.chinese: 嫪毐常從，賞賜甚厚，事皆決於嫪毐。
sentences.literal: Lao Ai constantly followed, rewards very thick, affairs all decided by Lao Ai.
sentences.idiomatic: Lao Ai constantly followed, rewards very thick, affairs all decided by Lao Ai.

sentences.chinese: 嫪毐家僮數千人，諸客求宦為嫪毐舍人千餘人。
sentences.literal: Lao Ai household retainers several thousand, various guests sought office as Lao Ai retainers thousand plus persons.
sentences.idiomatic: Lao Ai household retainers several thousand, various guests sought office as Lao Ai retainers thousand plus persons.

sentences.chinese: 始皇七年，莊襄王母夏太后薨。
sentences.literal: First Emperor seventh year, Zhuangxiang Wang mother Xia Empress Dowager died.
sentences.idiomatic: First Emperor seventh year, Zhuangxiang Wang mother Xia Empress Dowager died.

sentences.chinese: 孝文王后曰華陽太后，與孝文王會葬壽陵。
sentences.literal: Xiaowen Wang queen called Huayang Empress Dowager, with Xiaowen Wang met buried Shou Mausoleum.
sentences.idiomatic: Xiaowen Wang queen called Huayang Empress Dowager, with Xiaowen Wang met buried Shou Mausoleum.

sentences.chinese: 夏太后子莊襄王葬芷陽，故夏太后獨別葬杜東，曰「東望吾子，西望吾夫。
sentences.literal: Xia Empress Dowager son Zhuangxiang Wang buried Zhi Yang, thus Xia Empress Dowager alone separately buried Du east, said 'East look my son, west look my husband.
sentences.idiomatic: Xia Empress Dowager son Zhuangxiang Wang buried Zhi Yang, thus Xia Empress Dowager alone separately buried Du east, said 'East look my son, west look my husband.

sentences.chinese: 後百年，旁當有萬家邑」。
sentences.literal: After hundred years, beside should have ten thousand household city.'
sentences.idiomatic: After hundred years, beside should have ten thousand household city.'

sentences.chinese: 始皇九年，有告嫪毐實非宦者，常與太后私亂，生子二人，皆匿之。
sentences.literal: First Emperor ninth year, had accusation Lao Ai truly not eunuch, constantly with Empress Dowager privately chaotic, bore sons two persons, all hid them.
sentences.idiomatic: First Emperor ninth year, had accusation Lao Ai truly not eunuch, constantly with Empress Dowager privately chaotic, bore sons two persons, all hid them.

sentences.chinese: 與太后謀曰「王即薨，以子為後」。
sentences.literal: With Empress Dowager planned said 'King if dies, with son as successor'.
sentences.idiomatic: With Empress Dowager planned said 'King if dies, with son as successor'.

sentences.chinese: 於是秦王下吏治，具得情實，事連相國呂不韋。
sentences.literal: Thus Qin king sent officials investigate, fully obtained real situation, affair connected prime minister Lü Buwei.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus Qin king sent officials investigate, fully obtained real situation, affair connected prime minister Lü Buwei.

sentences.chinese: 九月，夷嫪毐三族，殺太后所生兩子，而遂遷太后於雍。
sentences.literal: Ninth month, exterminated Lao Ai three clans, killed Empress Dowager born two sons, then moved Empress Dowager to Yong.
sentences.idiomatic: Ninth month, exterminated Lao Ai three clans, killed Empress Dowager born two sons, then moved Empress Dowager to Yong.

sentences.chinese: 諸嫪毐舍人皆沒其家而遷之蜀。
sentences.literal: Various Lao Ai retainers all confiscated households moved to Shu.
sentences.idiomatic: Various Lao Ai retainers all confiscated households moved to Shu.

sentences.chinese: 王欲誅相國，為其奉先王功大，及賓客辯士為游說者眾，王不忍致法。
sentences.literal: King wished execute prime minister, for his serve previous king merit great, and guests debaters for wandering persuasion many, king not bear apply law.
sentences.idiomatic: King wished execute prime minister, for his serve previous king merit great, and guests debaters for wandering persuasion many, king not bear apply law.

sentences.chinese: 秦王十年十月，免相國呂不韋。
sentences.literal: Qin king tenth year tenth month, dismissed prime minister Lü Buwei.
sentences.idiomatic: Qin king tenth year tenth month, dismissed prime minister Lü Buwei.

sentences.chinese: 及齊人茅焦說秦王，秦王乃迎太后於雍，歸復咸陽，而出文信侯就國河南。
sentences.literal: When Qi person Mao Jiao persuaded Qin king, Qin king then welcomed Empress Dowager at Yong, returned restored Xianyang, yet sent Wenxin Marquis go to fief Henan.
sentences.idiomatic: When Qi person Mao Jiao persuaded Qin king, Qin king then welcomed Empress Dowager at Yong, returned restored Xianyang, yet sent Wenxin Marquis go to fief Henan.

sentences.chinese: 歲餘，諸侯賓客使者相望於道，請文信侯。
sentences.literal: Year plus, various feudal lord guests envoys mutually looked on road, requested Wenxin Marquis.
sentences.idiomatic: Year plus, various feudal lord guests envoys mutually looked on road, requested Wenxin Marquis.

sentences.chinese: 秦王恐其為變，乃賜文信侯書曰：「君何功於秦？
sentences.literal: Qin king feared his change, thus granted Wenxin Marquis letter said: 'Lord what merit to Qin?
sentences.idiomatic: Qin king feared his change, thus granted Wenxin Marquis letter said: 'Lord what merit to Qin?

sentences.chinese: 秦封君河南，食十萬戶。
sentences.literal: Qin enfeoffed lord Henan, ate ten thousand households.
sentences.idiomatic: Qin enfeoffed lord Henan, ate ten thousand households.

sentences.chinese: 君何親於秦？
sentences.literal: Lord what close to Qin?
sentences.idiomatic: Lord what close to Qin?

sentences.chinese: 號稱仲父。
sentences.literal: Titled Zhong Fu.
sentences.idiomatic: Titled Zhong Fu.

sentences.chinese: 其與家屬徙處蜀！」
sentences.literal: Him with family move dwell Shu!'
sentences.idiomatic: Him with family move dwell Shu!'

sentences.chinese: 呂不韋自度稍侵，恐誅，乃飲酖而死。
sentences.literal: Lü Buwei self-measured gradually encroached, feared execution, thus drank poison died.
sentences.idiomatic: Lü Buwei self-measured gradually encroached, feared execution, thus drank poison died.

sentences.chinese: 秦王所加怒呂不韋、嫪毐皆已死，乃皆復歸嫪毐舍人遷蜀者。
sentences.literal: Qin king added anger Lü Buwei, Lao Ai all already dead, thus all restored Lao Ai retainers moved Shu ones.
sentences.idiomatic: Qin king added anger Lü Buwei, Lao Ai all already dead, thus all restored Lao Ai retainers moved Shu ones.

sentences.chinese: 始皇十九年，太后薨，謚為帝太后，與莊襄王會葬茝陽。
sentences.literal: First Emperor nineteenth year, Empress Dowager died, posthumous title Di Empress Dowager, with Zhuangxiang Wang met buried Zhi Yang.
sentences.idiomatic: First Emperor nineteenth year, Empress Dowager died, posthumous title Di Empress Dowager, with Zhuangxiang Wang met buried Zhi Yang.

sentences.chinese: 太史公曰：不韋及嫪毐貴，封號文信侯。
sentences.literal: Grand Historian says: Buwei and Lao Ai noble, enfeoffed titled Wenxin Marquis.
sentences.idiomatic: Grand Historian says: Buwei and Lao Ai noble, enfeoffed titled Wenxin Marquis.

sentences.chinese: 人之告嫪毐，毐聞之。
sentences.literal: Person accused Lao Ai, Ai heard.
sentences.idiomatic: Person accused Lao Ai, Ai heard.

sentences.chinese: 秦王驗左右，未發。
sentences.literal: Qin king examined attendants, not issued.
sentences.idiomatic: Qin king examined attendants, not issued.

sentences.chinese: 上之雍郊，毐恐禍起，乃與黨謀，矯太后璽發卒以反蘄年宮。
sentences.literal: Went to Yong suburbs, Ai feared calamity rise, thus with party planned, forged Empress Dowager seal sent troops to rebel Qinian Palace.
sentences.idiomatic: Went to Yong suburbs, Ai feared calamity rise, thus with party planned, forged Empress Dowager seal sent troops to rebel Qinian Palace.

sentences.chinese: 發吏攻毐，毐敗亡走，追斬之好畤，遂滅其宗。
sentences.literal: Sent officials attacked Ai, Ai defeated fled, pursued beheaded Haozhi, thus extinguished his clan.
sentences.idiomatic: Sent officials attacked Ai, Ai defeated fled, pursued beheaded Haozhi, thus extinguished his clan.

sentences.chinese: 而呂不韋由此絀矣。
sentences.literal: Lü Buwei from this demoted.
sentences.idiomatic: Lü Buwei from this demoted.

sentences.chinese: 孔子之所謂「聞」者，其呂子乎？
sentences.literal: Confucius's so-called 'heard' ones, perhaps Lü Zi?
sentences.idiomatic: Confucius's so-called 'heard' ones, perhaps Lü Zi?
